item.description:
LADIES AFTERNOON IN!

Join me at my home in Wakefield (address will be sent to attendees) for a REALLY FUN girls only party!

We will have snacks and beverages and representatives from both Athena's Novelties and Lia Sophia Jewelry!

Don't be shy! This "naughty" party is sure to be a riot. (Not that anyone I've met in the group has been SHY yet! ha ha). Sorry boys... this one is just for the ladies. Athena's also has bath/spa products... so it's not ALL naughty! And you can win prizes!

Both demonstrators will present their products (and provide sampling!) from 4 - 6 pm but you are welcome to hang around longer!

NOTE: I have dogs and cats so take your allergy pills before you arrive!

If you want to preview the items or place an order even though you can't attend... visit their websites at:

http://www.athenashn....

http://www.liasophia....
item.name: GIRLS ONLY -- Athena's Home Party! Wink wink! AND Lia Sophia Jewelry Party!
